略.definition: brief; sketchy; outline; summary; to omit; (bound form before a single-character verb) a bit; somewhat; slightly; plan; strategy; to capture (territory)

略作.definition: to be abbreviated to; (followed by a verb) slightly

略去.definition: to omit; to delete; to leave out; to neglect; to skip over

略奪.definition: variant of 掠奪|掠夺[lu:e4 duo2]

略帶.definition: to have (an attribute) to a small degree; to have a touch of

略知一二.definition: (idiom) to know just a little; to have a rough idea

略知皮毛.definition: slight knowledge of sth; superficial acquaintance with a subject; a smattering

略舉.definition: some cases picked out as example; to highlight

略見一斑.definition: lit. to glimpse just one spot (of the leopard) (idiom); fig. to get an inkling of the whole picture

略識之無.definition: semiliterate; only knows words of one syllable; lit. to know only 之[zhi1] and 無|无[wu2]

略讀.definition: to read cursorily; to skim through

略跡原情.definition: to overlook past faults (idiom); to forgive and forget

略陽.definition: Lüeyang County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

略陽縣.definition: Lüeyang County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi
